name: Chempri - Stearic Acid Beads
description: Chempri specializes in oleochemicals and derivatives, offering Stearic Acid Beads that include both palmitic acid and stearic acid. The bead form facilitates easy handling and precise dosing for cosmetic formulations. Essential fatty acids for barrier repair and lipid matrix formation.
notes: Bead form provides easy handling advantage over traditional fatty acid powders. Contains both palmitic and stearic acid for comprehensive barrier support. Oleochemicals specialist ensures high quality fatty acids.
